results.title: Patient-derived microphysiological model identifies the therapeutic potential of metformin for thoracic aortic aneurysm
results.text_hl: @SPECIES_9606 @@@Patient@@@-derived microphysiological model identifies the therapeutic potential of @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ for @<m>DISEASE_Aortic_Aneurysm_Thoracic</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D017545 @@@thoracic aortic aneurysm@@@

results.title: Metformin and Risks of Aortic Aneurysm and Aortic Dissection: A Mendelian Randomization Study.
results.text_hl: Additionally, limited reporting exists on the relationships between @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ and @<m>DISEASE_Aortic_Aneurysm_Thoracic</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D017545 @@@thoracic aortic aneurysm@@@ (@<m>DISEASE_Aortic_Aneurysm_Thoracic</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D017545 @@@TAA@@@) and @DISEASE_Aortic_Dissection @DISEASE_MESH:D000784 @@@aortic dissection@@@ (@DISEASE_Aortic_Dissection @DISEASE_MESH:D000784 @@@AD@@@).

results.title: Potential Protective Role of Diabetes Mellitus on Aortic Aneurysms.
results.text_hl: Current data does confirm significant protective effect for @<m>DISEASE_Aortic_Aneurysm_Thoracic</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D017545 @@@TAA.We@@@ confirm that @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ does exert protective properties.
